name: The Maid_san's Caving Adventure - メイドさん洞窟探検 -
description: A maid wandered into a cave where the Benars live. Can she escape the cave safely by using her specialty trembling to get away from them?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7  ※ Windows 10 is not guaranteed. Processor: Intel Core i5 1.9GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Corresponding to OpenGL DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: D3DX9_39.dll (DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)) is required.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7  ※ Windows 10 is not guaranteed. Processor: Intel Core i7 3.5GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Corresponding to OpenGL DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: D3DX9_39.dll (DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)) is required.
